property.name: classdebuginfo
property.description: Enable debug info compilation in the generated servlet class

property.name: mappedfile
property.description: Maintain a one-to-one correspondence between static content and the generated servlet class' java code

property.name: usePrecompiled
property.description: It is assumed that JSP files have been precompiled, and their corresponding servlet classes have been bundled in the web applicationâ€™s WEB-INF/lib or WEB-INF/classes directory.

property.name: development
property.description: If set to true, enables development mode, which allows JSP files to be checked for modification.

property.name: reload-interval
property.description: Specifies the frequency in seconds at which JSP files are checked for modifications. Setting this value to -1 disables checks for JSP modifications and JSP recompilation.
